title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When I select text with leading or trailing whitespace and then use Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens because the trailing whitespace within the selection is not ignored.
EB: After selecting text with leading or trailing whitespace, using Ctrl+M (Add Import) should ignore the trailing whitespace within the selection and perform the import action.
SR: The Add Import feature should be modified to disregard any leading or trailing whitespace in the selected text, allowing the import action to be performed successfully.
